description.narrative: Muxima Shopping is a new US$130 million regional shopping centre development with an approximate gross leasable area of 25,961 m2 in Viana, a suburb of greater Luanda, the capital city of Angola (the Project).

The Project will have the following development impacts: (i) Modernising retail: The Project will help expand modern retail formats and improve access to quality business infrastructure thus stimulating a key area of the real estate sector in an underserved market; (ii) Employment generation: The Project will create significant local direct employment and indirect employment during construction as well as operation of the mall; and (iii) Enhanced local supply linkages: The Project will increase business opportunities to local suppliers of goods and services.

name.narrative: The Project is located on a plot size of 6 hectares in Viana, a suburb of the greater Luanda, 24 km east of the Luanda CBD. The mall will be built in an area which has a rapidly growing population, close to a city ring road and a major artery leading into the city centre.

activity-description.narrative: A description that qualifies the activity taking place at the location.
